title: Corki E visual bug
body:
When Corki used his E during the entire game these purple swirls showed up all over his character for the entire game

Only while his E was up it caused the bug

replies.body:
Oh hai! 

This is a known issue and we're working on a fix.

oh hai, Katey working weekends.

Thanks for the update :)
wtf are those particles supposed to even be on
